node.label: toMonitor
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

object.script:
-- 3x5 NARROW FONT -- Usage for your LUA: -- # copy & paste line 5 -- # copy & paste Property Text F1,F2,F3 and F4 PT=property.getText function NF(x,y,z)local c,d,f,p,q if type(z)=="number"then z=tostring(z)end d=PT("F1")..PT("F2")..PT("F3")..PT("F4")for i=1,z:len()do c=z:sub(i,i):byte()*5-159 for j=1,5 do f="0x"..d:sub(c,c+4):sub(j,j)for k=1,3 do if f&2^(4-k)>0then p=x+i*4+k-5 q=y+j-1 screen.drawLine(p,q,p+1,q)end end end end end
function onTick() end function onDraw() screen.setColor(10,200,10) NF(0, 2,"3*5 NARROW FONT") screen.setColor(200,200,200) NF(0,12," !\"#$%&'()*+,-./") NF(0,18,":;<=>?@[\\]^_{|}~") NF(0,24,"0123456789") NF(0,30,"ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOP") NF(0,36,"QRSTUVWXYZ") NF(0,42,"abcdefghijklmnop") NF(0,48,"qrstuvwxyz") screen.setColor(200,10,10) NF(0,12," &") NF(0,18," @ ~") screen.setColor(10,200,200) screen.drawText(6,58,"&= @= ~=") NF(16,58,"&") NF(36,58,"@") NF(56,58,"~") end

node.label: Input
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

object.script:
PT=property.getText function NF(x,y,z)local c,d,f,p,q if type(z)=="number"then z=tostring(z)end d=PT("F1")..PT("F2")..PT("F3")..PT("F4")for i=1,z:len()do c=z:sub(i,i):byte()*5-159 for j=1,5 do f="0x"..d:sub(c,c+4):sub(j,j)for k=1,3 do if f&2^(4-k)>0then p=x+i*4+k-5 q=y+j-1 screen.drawLine(p,q,p+1,q)end end end end end radio={["sendch"]=0,["recivech"]=0} function onDraw() screen.setColor(10,10,10) screen.drawClear()
screen.setColor(255,255,255) screen.drawTriangleF(2,1, 0,4, 5,4) --M screen.drawLine(2,4,2,6) screen.drawText(6,1,string.format("%04d",math.floor(radio.sendch )))--Ml screen.drawText(6,8,string.format("%04d",math.floor(radio.recivech)))
screen.setColor(30,30,30) --Ml screen.drawLine(0,6,32,6)
screen.setColor(25,25,25) screen.drawText(6,21,"0000")
screen.setColor(25,25,25) screen.drawRectF(27,0,5,6)--M{^ screen.drawRectF(27,7,5,5)--Ml screen.drawRectF(0,8,5,5)-- screen.drawRectF(2,14,5,5)--vision screen.drawRectF(8,14,5,5)--direction screen.drawRectF(14,14,5,5)--waypoint screen.drawRectF(20,14,5,5)--waypoint2 screen.drawRectF(27,14,5,5)--l screen.drawRectF(27,20,5,5)--l screen.drawRectF(0,21,5,5)--l screen.drawRectF(27,27,5,5)--ON/OFF screen.drawRectF(2,27,5,5) screen.drawRectF(8,27,5,5) screen.drawRectF(14,27,5,5) screen.drawRectF(20,27,5,5)
screen.setColor(255,255,255) screen.drawText(28,2,"^") --M{^ screen.drawText(28,7,"+") --Ml screen.drawText(1,8,"-") -- NF(3,13,"v") --vision --direction screen.drawLine(9,15,11,15)screen.drawLine(11,16,11,17)screen.drawLine(9,17,11,17)screen.drawLine(9,16,9,17) screen.drawText(15,14,"+") --waypoint screen.drawRectF(21,15,3,2)screen.drawLine(21,17,21,18) --waypoint2 screen.drawTriangleF(29,15,27,18,32,18) --l screen.drawTriangleF(29,25,26,21,32,21) --l screen.drawText(1,21,"-") --l screen.drawLine(28,29,28,31)screen.drawLine(29,28,31,28)screen.drawLine(30,30,30,31) --ON/OFF end

inn=input.getNumber inb=input.getBool
sct=screen.drawText scr=screen.drawRect scrf=screen.drawRectF scc=screen.setColor
cos=math.cos sin=math.sin pi=math.pi pi2=pi*2 pn=property.getNumber mode=property.getBool("Switch Number Of Display Directions") rc,gc,bc=pn("Circle R"),pn("Circle G"),pn("Circle B") rd,gd,bd=pn("Direction R"),pn("Direction G"),pn("Direction B") rb,gb,bb=pn("Ship R"),pn("Ship G"),pn("Ship B")
function onTick() com=inn(1) acom=inn(2) auto=input.getBool(1) end function onDraw() w=screen.getWidth() h=screen.getHeight() y=250 scc(rb,gb,bb) if h==32 then r=9 r1=13.5 a=w/2 scrf(a-3,14,5,8) screen.drawTriangleF(a-1,10,a-3,14,a+2,15) elseif h==64 then r=19.5 r1=27.5 a=w/2 scrf(a-5,26,9,20) screen.drawTriangleF(a-1,16,a-5.5,26,a+4,26) elseif h==96 then r=35.25 r1=43.75 a=w/2 scrf(a-6,42,11,35) screen.drawTriangleF(a-0.8,20,a-6.75,42,a+4.5,42) elseif h==160 then y=450 r=67.75 r1=75.75 scrf(130,64,31,72) screen.drawTriangleF(144.5,20,130,64,161,64) end
scc(rc,gc,bc) for i=1,y do x=i/y*pi2 sct(cos(x)*r+w/2-1.5,sin(x)*r+h/2-4.5,".") end scc(rd,gd,bd) x=com*pi2-(pi/2) sct(cos(x)*r1+w/2-1.75,sin(x)*r1+h/2-2.25,"N")
x=x-(pi/2) sct(cos(x)*r1+w/2-1.75,sin(x)*r1+h/2-2.25,"E")
x=x-(pi/2) sct(cos(x)*r1+w/2-1.75,sin(x)*r1+h/2-2.25,"S")
x=x-(pi/2) sct(cos(x)*r1+w/2-1.75,sin(x)*r1+h/2-2.25,"W")
if mode then x=x-(pi/4) x=x-(pi/2) sct(cos(x)*r1+w/2-4.25,sin(x)*r1+h/2-2.25,"NE")
x=x-(pi/2) sct(cos(x)*r1+w/2-4.25,sin(x)*r1+h/2-2.25,"SE")
x=x-(pi/2) sct(cos(x)*r1+w/2-4.25,sin(x)*r1+h/2-2.25,"SW")
x=x-(pi/2) sct(cos(x)*r1+w/2-4.25,sin(x)*r1+h/2-2.25,"NW") end
if auto then x=acom*pi2-(pi/2) screen.drawLine(w/2,h/2,cos(x)*h/2+w/2,sin(x)*h/2+h/2) end end

node.label: Input
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

object.script: function onTick() a=input.getNumber(input.getNumber(11)) if a==11 then a==118 end output.setNumber(1,a) output.setNumber(2,input.getNumber(11)) output.setNumber(3,input.getNumber(input.getNumber(12)%11+1)) end

-- Tick function that will be executed every logic tick function onTick() -- This uses the game's basis. That is, -- vehicle world color -- x right east red -- y up up green -- z forward north blue
-- Better constant. tau = 2 * math.pi
-- Get angles. x = input.getNumber(4) y = input.getNumber(5) z = input.getNumber(6)
-- sin, 'cos I like it. cx, sx = math.cos(x), math.sin(x) cy, sy = math.cos(y), math.sin(y) cz, sz = math.cos(z), math.sin(z)
-- Build matrix. m00 = cy*cz m01 = -cx*sz + sx*sy*cz m02 = sx*sz + cx*sy*cz m10 = cy*sz m11 = cx*cz + sx*sy*sz m12 = -sx*cz + cx*sy*sz m20 = -sy m21 = sx*cy m22 = cx*cy
-- Compute tilts. Less stable near gimbal lock. m11 and m12 can exceed asin's domain. tilt_x = math.asin(m10) / tau tilt_y = math.asin(m11) / tau tilt_z = math.asin(m12) / tau
-- Alternatively, compute tilts stably. tilt_x = math.atan(m10, math.sqrt(m00*m00 + m20*m20)) / tau tilt_y = math.atan(m11, math.sqrt(m01*m01 + m21*m21)) / tau tilt_z = math.atan(m12, math.sqrt(m02*m02 + m22*m22)) / tau
-- Equally good alternative if you prefer. tilt_x = math.atan(m10, math.sqrt(m12*m12 + m11*m11)) / tau tilt_y = math.atan(m11, math.sqrt(m10*m10 + m12*m12)) / tau tilt_z = math.atan(m12, math.sqrt(m11*m11 + m10*m10)) / tau
-- Compute compasses. compass_x = math.atan(m00, m20) / -tau compass_y = math.atan(m01, m21) / -tau compass_z = math.atan(m02, m22) / -tau
-- Get global angular velocities. ax = input.getNumber(10) ay = input.getNumber(11) az = input.getNumber(12)
-- Transform them to the local frame. angular_x = m00*ax + m10*ay + m20*az angular_y = m01*ax + m11*ay + m21*az angular_z = m02*ax + m12*ay + m22*az
output.setNumber(1,compass_y) end

l=drawRectF;X=screen;Y=property;Z=math;_=input;a0=type;a1=tostring A="Var,1.0"B="ByMAKKI"p="CUICS"C="Powerd"D="Cpl."E="USE 1*1"F="ONLYCAN"h=255;i=350;e=128;f=120;c=100;r=true;j=X;G=Y;s=Z;H=s.abs;q=G.getText;t=j.drawRectF;I=j.drawCircleF;m=j.drawLine;k=j.drawClear;b=j.setColor;J=_.getBool;a=0;n=r;function onTick()if not G.getBool("StartUp Screen")then return end;if J(14)then n=r end;if J(13)then n=false end;if not n then a=a+1 else a=0;return end;K=1 end;function onDraw()if not n then if K==1 then if a<60 then b(0,0,0)k()b(c,c,c)m(0,0,32,32)m(0,32,32,0)elseif a<f then b(0,0,0)k()b(c,c,c)l((a-90)/60*e,15,(a-60)/60*e,16)elseif a<245 then b(0,0,0)k()b(c,c,c)b(g(a-f,0,e)/16,g(a-f,0,e)/16,g(a-f,0,e)/16)I(33,15,(a-f)*4)b(0,0,0)d(7,14,p)elseif a<i then b(10,10,10)l(0,0,32,32)b(0,0,0)d(7,14,p)d(17,25,D)elseif a<410 then b(10,10,10,h-g(a-i,0,60)/60*h)l(0,0,32,32)b(0,0,0,h-g(a-i,0,60)/60*h)d(7,14,p)d(17,25,D)else n=r end;K=2 else if a<60 then b(0,0,0)k()b(c,c,c)m(0,0,32,32)m(0,32,32,0)elseif a<f then b(0,0,0)k()b(c,c,c)l((a-105)/60*e,15,(a-75)/60*e,16)elseif a<245 then b(0,0,0)k()b(c,c,c)b(g(a-f,0,e)/16,g(a-f,0,e)/16,g(a-f,0,e)/16)I(-1,15,(a-f)*4)b(0,0,0)d(7,14,p)elseif a<i then b(10,10,10)l(0,0,32,32)b(0,0,0)d(3,3,A)d(1,19,C)d(2,25,B)elseif a<410 then b(10,10,10,h-g(a-i,0,60)/60*h)l(0,0,32,32)b(0,0,0,h-g(a-i,0,60)/60*h)d(3,3,A)d(1,19,C)d(2,25,B)end end;b(c,c,c)j.drawRect(-1,-1,33,33)b(0,10,0)t(0,35,35,477)t(35,0,477,256)b(c,0,0)d(0,34,F)d(0,40,E)d(34,2,F)d(34,8,E)b(c,c,c)else return end end;function d(Q,R,o)local u,L,M,v,w;if a0(o)=="number"then o=a1(o)end;L=q("F1")..q("F2")..q("F3")..q("F4")for x=1,o:len()do u=o:sub(x,x):byte()*5-159;for y=1,5 do M="0x"..L:sub(u,u+4):sub(y,y)for N=1,3 do if M&2^(4-N)>0 then v=Q+x*4+N-5;w=R+y-1;m(v,w,v+1,w)end end end end end;function l(O,P,S,T)t(O,P,H(O-S)+1,H(P-T)+1)end;function g(U,V,W)local z=s.min(s.max(U,V),W)if z~=z then return 0 else return z end end

-- Author: <Authorname> (Please change this in user settings, Ctrl+Comma) -- GitHub: <GithubLink> -- Workshop: <WorkshopLink> -- -- Developed & Minimized using LifeBoatAPI - Stormworks Lua plugin for VSCode -- https://code.visualstudio.com/download (search "Stormworks Lua with LifeboatAPI" extension) -- By Nameous Changey -- Minimized Size: 3249 (3616 with comment) chars
j=360 b=255 q=false e=tonumber y=true N=string o=math u=screen au=property ai=au.getNumber L=u.drawText Z=o.deg v=o.floor aj=N.format m=u.drawRectF a=u.setColor p=u.drawLine r=au.getText am=table.insert c=o.pi W=o.sqrt z=o.atan k=o.sin g=o.cos l=input.getNumber if y then end _={}function aQ()_.bw=l(1)_.be=l(2)_.bv=l(3)local I=l(4)local S=l(5)local Q=l(6)local ad=l(10)local ac=l(11)local V=l(12)local C,F=g(I),k(I)local O,J=g(S),k(S)local G,D=g(Q),k(Q)local aX=O*G local aJ=-C*D+F*J*G local aT=F*D+C*J*G local x=O*D local w=C*G+F*J*D local t=-F*G+C*J*D local aD=-J local aW=F*O local aF=C*O _.bd=z(x,W(t*t+w*w))/(c*2)_.aO=z(w,W(x*x+t*t))/(c*2)_.bn=z(t,W(w*w+x*x))/(c*2)local aN=-z(k(I)*k(Q)+g(I)*k(S)*g(Q),g(I)*g(S))/2/c _.n=((((1-aN)%1)*(c*2)))_.bx=aX*ad+x*ac+aD*V _.bt=aJ*ad+w*ac+aW*V _.bu=aT*ad+t*ac+aF*V _.s=z(_.aO,_.bd)_.X=_.bn end function bg(M,ap)if N.find(M,ap)==nil then return{M}end local aa={}local aY="(.-)"..ap.."()" local an for bq,bj in N.gmatch(M,aY)do am(aa,bq)an=bj end am(aa,N.sub(M,an))return aa end function af(aU)local U=e(r(aU),16)return(U>>16)& b,(U>>8)& b,U & b end function bk(aS,bl,A)return(1-A)*aS+A*bl end function bc(aV,bp,H)local Y,aw,as,ae,ag if type(H)=="number"then H=tostring(H)end aw=r("F1")..r("F2")..r("F3")..r("F4")for d=1,H:len()do Y=H:sub(d,d):byte()*5-159 for ab=1,5 do as="0x"..aw:sub(Y,Y+4):sub(ab,ab)for ao=1,3 do if as&2^(4-ao)>0 then ae=aV+d*4+ao-5 ag=bp+ab-1 p(ae,ag,ae+1,ag)end end end end end function b_()local aq=0 local az=0 local P=10 local bf=8 for d=-j//P,j//P do local bo=g(_.s)*(d+_.X/c*5)+aL/2 local aK=k(_.s)*(d+_.X/c*5)+aB/2 local A,ah=g(_.s)*d*P+bo,k(_.s)*d*P+aK local ay=_.s+c/2 local ak=-_.s+c/2 local E=g(bk(0,c/2,(d+_.X)/j*aB))*bf if d==0 then a(b,b,b)local E=20 elseif d<0 then a(50,b,50)else a(50,50,b)end local bh,bm=g(ay)*E+A,k(ay)*E+ah local aC,aH=g(ak)*E+A,-k(ak)*E+ah p(bh+aq,bm+az,aC+aq,aH+az)end end function bb(at)local i=0 local ar=300 a(5,5,5)m(10,23,11,7)m(9,24,13,5)a(b,b,225)bc(10,24,aj("%03d",e(v(Z(_.n)))))a(5,70,5)local f=4 local B=j*f/5*4 for d=0,32/f do local i=(-_.n/c/2*(B/f)+d*f)%32 p(i,29+d%2,i,33)end local T=j*f i=((-_.n/c/2+.00)*(B/f)+4*f)%T L(i-1,25,"N")i=((-_.n/c/2+.25)*(B/f)+4*f)%T L(i-1,25,"E")i=((-_.n/c/2+.50)*(B/f)+4*f)%T L(i-1,25,"S")i=((-_.n/c/2+.75)*(B/f)+4*f)%T L(i-1,25,"W")a(250,250,40)p(v(((v(Z(-_.n)+270-at+j)%j)/j)*ar),29,v(((v(Z(-_.n)+270-at+j)%j)/j)*ar),33)end function ba(aR,aM,bi,aZ)h=bg(aP,",")if aR then a(e(h[1]),e(h[2]),e(h[3]))else a(10,10,10)end m(0,4,4,3)if aM then a(e(h[4]),e(h[5]),e(h[6]))else a(10,10,10)end m(0,10,4,3)if bi then a(e(h[7]),e(h[8]),e(h[9]))else a(10,10,10)end m(0,16,4,3)if aZ then a(e(h[7]),e(h[8]),e(h[9]))else a(10,10,10)end m(0,22,4,3)end function aG()a(b,10,50,100)m(0,12,32,7)a(b,b,b)p(2,0,2,32)a(b,190,0)m(0,13,4,5)p(4,14,4,17)p(5,15,8,15)u.drawTriangleF(30,16,32,13,32,19)a(b,b,b)u.drawTextBox(6,0,26,32,aj("%04d",v(_.be*aE)),0,0)end aI,ax,av=af("SkyColor")bs,ax,av=af("LandColor")aI,ax,av=af("CenterLineColor")aP=r("indicatorColor")aE=ai("Altitude Unit")br=ai("Speed Unit")aA=y K=y R={q,q,q,q}function onTick()if aA then aA=q end if K==q then return end al=1 aQ()K=q end function onDraw()if(al==1)then if K==y then return end K=y aL,aB=32,32 bb(0)ba(R[1],R[2],R[3],R[4])al=2 else b_()aG()end end
